description.value:
Creature Type. You are a Humanoid.

Size. You are Medium.

Speed. Your Speed is 30 feet.

Darkvision. You have Darkvision to a range of 60 feet.

Bestial Instincts. Channeling the beast within, you have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation, or Survival.

Feral Impulses. You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the &Reference[Blinded apply=false], &Reference[Deafened apply=false], and &Reference[Weakened apply=false] condition on yourself.

Longtooth Shifting. As a Bonus Action, you can assume a more bestial appearance. This transformation lasts for 1 minute, until you die, or until you revert to your normal appearance as a Bonus Action. When you shift, you gain the following benefits:

  • Temporary Hit Points equal to 2 times your Proficiency Bonus.
  • Your fangs are natural weapons, which you can use to make Unarmed Strikes. As a Bonus Action on your other turns while shifted, you can use your elongated fangs to make an Unarmed Strike. If you hit with your fangs, you can deal Piercing damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier or Dexterity modifier (You choose this when you select this species), instead of the Bludgeoning damage normal for an Unarmed Strike.

You can shift a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

When you reach character level 5, if you are reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright while shifted, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead. Your transformation immediately ends as a result. Once you use this trait, you cannot do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

advancement.hint: Core rule that provides a bonus based on character level and intelligence modifier at levels 6, 12, 18.  Does NOT apply retroactively and is not affected by temporary changes in Intelligence stat (from items or other buffs/debuffs).
